body.name: FACETORY Light My Night Sheet Mask with Yuja Extract - Soft, Form-Fitting Face Mask, For Acne-Prone Skin - Illuminating, Radiance Boosting, Smoothing (Pack of 5)

features: 🍋 YUJA EXTRACT to even out the complexion, minimize the appearance of dark spots, post-acne marks, and dullness. This ingredient helps boost collagen and reduce fine lines and wrinkles.
🍎 FRUIT EXTRACTS from apple, papaya, and kiwi to add radiance and protection to the skin. These ingredients also helps smooth the skin and are great as anti-aging treatments.

✔️ LIGHTWEIGHT, NON-TACKY ESSENCE that balances and soothes irritated skin for a clearer complexion. The soothing essence is great for combo, oily, and acne-prone skin types as it helps calm redness and pimples.
🖤 GRAPHENE MATERIAL mask that has a strong absorption capacity to deliver ingredients deeper into the skin. Leave sheet mask on for 10-15 minutes so your skin is ultra nourished.

✔ WHY SHEET MASKS? Sheet masks are great for gifting for birthdays, mothers day, holiday, and simple appreciation gifts! They are the best self-care product to use when you want to unwind at the end of a long day.

💕 CRUELTY-FREE, TESTED AND LOVED - Our products are not tested on animals. Products are made in Korea.👌 products are carefully tested and researched by our team. We make sure we love the formula before we share it with our customers. All products are forumulated with quality ingredients and does not contain any harsh ingredients

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: FaceTory Light My Night Brightening & Strengthening This sheet mask features a graphene mask with a brightening, fruit-infused essence. Indulge in this refreshing sheet mask and wake up to radiant skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2021
reviews.reviewText: My skin feels so amazing after using this mask! I have highly sensitive skin and this mask soothes and refreshes. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very moisturizing, good thickness makes it easy to apply
reviews.reviewText: I like FaceTory's sheet masks - they're affordable and they work well. This one is a black sheet mask, somewhat thick, and because of the thickness, is quite easy to place on the face. I've found the thinner ones to slip and slide, and just takes extra effort to wrangle it on your face. I wasn't sure which side I had to use facing my skin as that information wasn't available on the packaging. I assumed the side with the lines (graphene technology) is facing outwards, and once I looked on this page I realized that is the correct way of using these. The sheet is soaked in serum although there is no extra serum in the packet for you to slather on your neck. I think how quickly these masks dry on your skin also depends on the weather, as mine took over 20 minutes and I actually removed them before it even came close to drying up. My skin felt very moisturized and still soaked in serum. It does feel slightly sticky but I was heading to bed anyways so I didn't mind. I also did notice the brightening, although it could be the dewy glow of the serum on my face. Overall I did like these masks and think they are good value. They seem to work just as well as any other sheet masks, if not better than some of the ones I've tried.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great balancing, calming and exfoliating mask for oily and combo skin types
reviews.reviewText: FaceTory I Pinky Promise Antioxidant Sheet Mask with Probiotics and Beet Root ExtractThese pink sheets are on a blue paper backing to assist in unfolding and placing the mask. Fit and adherence are excellent. The serum helps balance oil levels and calms skin. It also has some antioxidant, exfoliating and brightening effects. Not all that moisturizing. Best for oily and combo skin types.#alcohol-free #fragrance & essentialoil-freeKey Ingredients:Anti-acne: NiacinamideAntioxidant: Beta Vulgaris (Beet) Root ExtractCell-communicating ingredient: NiacinamideExfoliant: GluconolactoneSkin brightening: NiacinamideSkin-identical ingredient: Glycerin, Arginine, Sodium HyaluronateSoothing: Echinacea Angustifolia Extract, Pseudoalteromonas Ferment Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Allantoin, Dipotassium GlycyrrhizateFull Ingredients:Water, Propanediol, Glycereth-26, Osmanthus Fragrans Flower Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Chamaecyparis Obtusa Water, Solanum Melongena (Eggplant) Fruit Extract, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Flower Extract, Echinacea Angustifolia Extract, Beta Vulgaris (Beet) Root Extract, Euterpe Oleracea Fruit Extract, Butylene Glycol, Pseudoalteromonas Ferment Extract, Lactococcus Ferment Lysate, Lactobacillus Ferment Lysate, Acrylates/​C10-30, ​Allyl Methacrylates Crosspolymer, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Arginine, Betaine, Allantoin, Tetrasodium Iminodisuccinate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Gluconolactone, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Cyanocobalamin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I gat it for my mom nothing too special but there really good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I love Facetory. This is a fabulous k beauty brand and their masks are one of my favorite budget friendly masks. This one even smells good. Adheres well and fits my face perfectly. Facetory is where it's at when it comes to cost effective beauty regimen masks. I always recommend this brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I am familiar with this brand because of their acne patches. They're my favorite ones around and the face mask is just as good. Having acne prone skin I went for the calming one with acne treating ingredients. It's been great. I can use it without worry of a break out and my skin feels very nice afterward. I try to use a mask like this about once a week in combination with a mud mask and my daily skin care routine. I've found since starting a full routine I feel and look a lot better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Graphene masks for radiance
reviews.reviewText: I like FaceTory products. These masks are made from graphene and they are black. They have plenty of serum without being drippy and adhere well to my face. They feel soothing and hydrating. They leave my face with an healthy glow 🌟. Nice 👍Thanks for reading this review. Have a nice day. 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Didn't receive my items...
reviews.reviewText: I'm sure the mask itself is fabulous and fine, however, I only received one mask in the package when I purchased a pack of 5. Incredibly disappointing...
